summary: Thomas Montgomery, a married father of two young daughters, gets seduced by the world of online gambling and chat rooms where a virtual romance and sexual obsession ultimately leads to the murder of an innocent man.
cast: Garret Dillahunt|Brando Eaton|Laura San Giacomo|Molly Hagan|Taylor Geare|Jadin Gould|Ashley Hinshaw|Drew Seeley|Nicholas Turturro|Jose Pablo Cantillo|Richmond Arquette|Michael Dunn|Brett Rice|Courteney Cox|Jimmy Townsend|Bill Parks|Papa Doug Manchester|Molly Ricchiuti|Polina Matveeva|Laci Mercede|Lucy Angelo|Berj Daniel Bedrosian|Taylor Briggs|Chelsea Cook|Aishling Doherty|Elijah Grissom|D'Janine King-Lasky|Brittany Lasky|Cassidy Mack|Cindy Schoonover|Victor Taylor|Tai Urban|Lileigh Waller|Steven Whitmore|Yasmeen Yamak
title: Rubia, sexy, alta
